snippet: Dynamo Moscow’s Alexander Ovechkin of the Capitals and Lev Praha’s Zdeno Chara of the Bruins have resumed their friendly competition in the K.H.L.
abstract: Professional hockey players Alexander Ovechkin and Zdeno Chara continue their rivalry, skating for their newest clubs, Dynamo Moscow and HC Lev Praha, in the most highly anticipated Kontinental Hockey League contest since the NHL lockout began; Ovechkin lifts Dynamo to a 1-0 victory.
lead_paragraph: Dynamo Moscow’s Alexander Ovechkin of the Capitals and Lev Praha’s Zdeno Chara of the Bruins have resumed their friendly competition in the K.H.L.

headline.seo: Alex Ovechkin and Zdeno Chara Keep Rivalry Going in K.H.L.
headline.main: N.H.L. Players’ Rivalry Has No Borders
headline.print_headline: N.H.L. Players’ Rivalry Has No Borders
